name: CP-1
description: Guide the user in developing, documenting, and disseminating a contingency planning policy and procedures that address purpose, scope, roles, responsibilities, management commitment, coordination, and compliance with applicable laws, directives, and guidelines.

scenario.description: Optional scenario description for the contingency planning context. If not provided, the function will guide based on the basic requirements.

trigger_events.description: Events that trigger a review and update of the contingency planning policy and procedures, e.g., after a significant incident, system changes, etc.

personnel_roles.description: Roles or personnel within the organization responsible for contingency planning, e.g., IT Manager, Security Officer, etc.

review_frequency.description: The frequency at which the contingency planning policy and procedures should be reviewed and updated, e.g., annually, bi-annually.

official_designate.description: The official designated to manage the development, documentation, and dissemination of the contingency planning policy.

compliance_requirements.description: Applicable laws, executive orders, directives, regulations, policies, standards, and guidelines with which the contingency planning policy must comply.

contingency_policy_level.description: The level at which the contingency planning policy is being developed, e.g., organization-level, mission/business process-level, system-level.
